text: Barawa (, Madīna Barāwa), also known as Barawe and Brava, is the capital of the Koofur Orsi state of Somalia.Pelizzari, Elisa. "Guerre civile et question de genre en Somalie. Les événements et leurs retombées sur le destin d’une femme: Starlin Abdi Arush (1957-2002)." Cahiers du Genre 1 (2018): 193-213. The city is a port on the Somali Sea.Oxford Analytica. "Somalia's fast-tracked state creation carries risks." Emerald Expert Briefings oxan-db. == References == Category:Cities in Somalia Category:Koofur Orsi
title: Barawa
